name: Primary Shopping Channel by Age Group
description: Analysis of customer primary shopping channel preferences across different age groups.
insights: Online - Website is the most preferred channel across all age groups, followed by Online - App. The 18-24 age group shows the highest overall engagement. This suggests a need for a strong online presence, with tailored strategies for different age demographics.
query: SELECT CASE WHEN age < 18 THEN '0-17' WHEN age BETWEEN 18 AND 24 THEN '18-24' WHEN age BETWEEN 25 AND 34 THEN '25-34' WHEN age BETWEEN 35 AND 44 THEN '35-44' WHEN age BETWEEN 45 AND 54 THEN '45-54' WHEN age BETWEEN 55 AND 64 THEN '55-64' ELSE '65+' END AS age_group, primary_shopping_channel, COUNT(customer_id) AS customer_count FROM customer_data_retail.customers GROUP BY age_group, primary_shopping_channel ORDER BY age_group, customer_count DESC;
